text: Voistinu, Allakh kupil u veruyushchikh ikh dushi i imushchestvo v obmen na Ray. Oni srazhayutsya na puti Allakha, ubivaya i pogibaya. Takovo Yego obeshchaniye i obyazatel'stvo v Taurate (Tore), Indzhile (Yevangelii) i Korane. Kto vypolnyayet svoi obeshchaniya luchshe Allakha? Vozraduytes' zhe sdelke, kotoruyu vy zaklyuchili. Eto i yest' velikoye preuspeyaniye
